title: Dependency Diagnostic
description: What you get: capability dependency map, contract exposure snapshot, and continuity baselines finance can trust. Typical timeline: 2–3 weeks. Decision enabled: where dependency is actually risky vs. simply inconvenient.

title: Capability Pilot
description: What you get: one ringfenced capability run in parallel with reconciliations, exception handling, and rollback criteria defined up front. Typical timeline: 4–8 weeks. Decision enabled: approve cutover, extend the pilot, or stop safely.

title: Controlled Cutover Program
description: What you get: sequenced capability replacements, executive control narratives, and governance routines that reduce dependency quarter by quarter. Typical timeline: roadmap-led. Decision enabled: scale with clarity instead of committing to a full replatform.
